Get started

Quickstart guide to use pyTESEO

Installation

Note

For now, this package can only be installed directly from github repository through pip! This can be done also from a conda environment, but always using pip.

$ pip install git+ssh://git@github.com/IHCantabria/pyteseo

Structure

  1. pyteseo.io - Bunch of functions to read and write all the necesary files for a TESEO simulation.

  2. pyteseo.config - Bunch of functions to obtain configuration variables to write TESEO’s configuration files (*.cfg and *.run)

  3. pyteseo.plot - Bunch of functions to plot default figures of all the results calculated by TESEO model

  4. pyteseo.export - Bunch of functions to export TESEO results to standard formats (*.csv, *.json, *.geojson, *.nc)

Use Cases

List of use cases developed as a guide to use this package
